expenseForm.title: Add an Expense
expenseForm.instructions: Please fill out the form below to track your expense. Fields marked with * are required.

validations.alpha: Please enter only letters. No Numbers and special characters.
validations.between: The {property} value must be between {min} and {max}.
validations.required: Please fill out the '{property}' field. It is required.
validations.maxLength: The input must not be longer than {max} characters.
validations.notInFuture: Date must be today or in the past. Future dates are not allowed.
validations.minValue: The {property} value is too low. It must be at least {min}.
validations.maxValue: The {property} value is too high. It must be no more than {max}.
validations.numeric: Please enter a valid number. Other characters are not allowed.
validations.isLength: The input must be exactly {length} characters long.
